sentences.en: ...the displacement of traditional agriculture by industrial crops.
sentences.cn: …经济作物对传统农业的替代。

sentences.en: A disturbance traveling through a medium by which energy is transferred from one particle of the medium to another without causing any permanent displacement of the medium itself.
sentences.cn: 波，振动：穿过介质的振动，通过振动使能量从介质的一个粒子传送到另一个粒子而并不导致介质本身的永久变位。

sentences.en: Consider now the same test carried out with servo control based on crosshead travel or displacement of the grips .
sentences.cn: 现在我们来研究用十字夹头位移或位移夹头伺服控制来完成相同的试验。

sentences.en: Consideration of these actions evolves into a mixed force - displacement analysis.
sentences.cn: 对于这些作用的考虑导致了一种混合力 -- 移位分析法.

sentences.en: For this reason the method is often called the " displacement method ".
sentences.cn: 由于这个原因,这种方法通常被称为 “ 位移法 ”.

sentences.en: Imbibition is thus displacement due only to capillary forces.
sentences.cn: 于是,吸吮是仅仅依靠毛细力的一种驱替.

sentences.en: It appears that both rate and displacement controls are acceptable to pilots.
sentences.cn: 看来角速度操纵和角位移操纵都是驾驶员可接受的.

sentences.en: Let the junction of the three fracture lines have a virtual displacement.
sentences.cn: 令三条折断线的相交处有一虚位移.

sentences.en: Static and dynamic displacement is another method of categorizing this parameter.
sentences.cn: 静态和动态位移是这个参数的另一种分类方法.

sentences.en: Such a displacement could have a significent bearing on conclusions.
sentences.cn: 这种位移对其结论会产生重大的影响.

sentences.en: Such immersion or displacement deposits are usually spongy and black.
sentences.cn: 这种浸镀或置换是海棉状和黑色的.

sentences.en: Sudden rupture and displacement occurs with normal, reverse, strike - slip, or oblique - slip faulting.
sentences.cn: 突然破裂和位移伴随正 、 逆 、 走向滑动或斜向滑动断层作用而发生.

sentences.en: The displacement function must not have any preferred direction.
sentences.cn: 位移函数不准有任何优先用法.

sentences.en: the displacement of traditional agriculture by industrial crops
sentences.cn: 经济作物对传统农业的替代

sentences.en: The normal displacement was calculated to be just over 29, 000 tons.
sentences.cn: 正常排水量刚刚超过29, 000吨.

sentences.en: The radial displacement must be accompanied by a circumferential force.
sentences.cn: 径向位移必须伴有圆周力.

sentences.en: These should be four undetermined constants in the displacement function.
sentences.cn: 位移函数中应有四个未定常数.

sentences.en: This is doubtless due to the displacement of hand labour by machinery.
sentences.cn: 无疑这是使用机器代替手工所产生的结果.

sentences.en: Thus the displacement amplitude of even the loudest sound is extremely small.
sentences.cn: 这样,即使是最强声音的位移振幅,也还是非常小的.

sentences.en: To calculate the field, an assumption of displacement charge is introduced.
sentences.cn: 为计算这一径向电场，引入了位移电荷的假定。

words.tran_cn: 取代；置换；转移；把…免职；排水
[化学]取代，[心理]移位；[船][航][机]排水量

phrases.tran_cn: 排水量曲线；排量曲线；驱替特征曲线
驱替效率；置换效率；洗油效率
横向位移，侧向位移；侧方移位

trans.tran_cn: 取代，免职，迫使迁徙，〈船〉 排水量，〈化〉置换
trans.tran_en: the act of displacing sb/sth; the process of being displaced
